title: Our Supervisors
subtitle: Academic & Professional Guidance
description: Distinguished professors guiding our journey in computer science and innovation, providing expertise and mentorship to our members

supervisors.name: Amine Makhlouf
supervisors.department: Sub-Directorate of Cultural and Sports Activities, University Center
supervisors.bio: A distinguished professor and supervisor who works in the Sub-Directorate of Cultural and Sports Activities at the University Center. He supports students' creative initiatives and contributes his expertise in guiding the club towards its educational and media objectives.

supervisors.name: Prof. Habib Safi
supervisors.role: Director of University Center of Naama
supervisors.bio: Director of the University Center of Naama and Professor in Islamic Studies. Provides strategic guidance to the club and supports its academic initiatives within the university.

supervisors.name: Dr. Khalwati Mosaab
supervisors.bio: Doctor specialized in law with exceptional practical and academic experience. Contributes to the club's governance and provides valuable insights on ethical and legal aspects of technology implementation.
